Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides customers with the right to their own energy usage information; repealer
Summary: Provides customers with the right to their own energy usage information; repeals certain provisions relating to energy planning.
LawCode: Rpld & add §3-101 sub 7, add Art 22 §§22-101 - 22-104, Energy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to providing a customer the right to energy usage information; and to repeal subdivision 7 of section 3-101 of the energy law relating to energy planning
